name: Interface naming convention - case and character set control
description: Names of Interfaces should have an uppercase second character and should not include any underscore.
output:
This report lists all Interfaces with second letter not in uppercase or having an underscore in their name.
It provides the following information:  Interface full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected
reference:
1.Interface names should begin with I , then PascalCase like IComponent.  ( second char is uppercase).
  https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/design-guidelines/names-of-classes-structs-and-interfaces.

2. don't use underscore - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-1.1/8bc1fexb(v=vs.71)
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
alternativeName: Interface naming convention - case and character set control

technicalCriteria.name: CWE-1099 - Inconsistent Naming Conventions for Identifiers
